data.text: @luckytran Here's a good complementary thread for @POTUS blatant mendacity: https://t.co/zU70f6Hgqe
@libsinWA Lmao, your own article debunks your claim that anything said in this thread is wrong. You're so unbelievably bad at this.

@luckytran @WalkerBragman BS. Omicron has not caused 120,000 deaths. 120,000 people have died and had COVID since omicron was here. Many were already in the hospital with delta. Many were already dying and got omicron. Such hyperbole.
@luckytran Exactly 💯. So infuriating how they are spinning Omnicron.
@luckytran Minimal disruptions regardless of the casualties was and continues to be the plan.

@luckytran @CDCgov @OurWorldInData And even another way, looking at current weekly numbers of all cause deaths including excess mortality, which is *currently* higher than Delta peak and first pandemic wave peak. https://t.co/PLg2u60YLu https://t.co/yfT1jLUT4s
@ErinSandersNP @luckytran @CDCgov @OurWorldInData And yet almost ALL mitigation strategies are ending lol we haven't even stopped having a horrific amount of death yet

@luckytran @CDCgov Shared another way, the 7 day rolling average of daily new confirmed #COVID19 deaths per million people per @OurWorldInData, is *currently* about the peak of deaths from Delta and near the peak of deaths from the first pandemic surge in the US. https://t.co/yPNTXlnemQ https://t.co/1GeG1lAHjd
